description: Position of first occurrence of n in the continued fraction for the Euler-Mascheroni constant (gamma).
comments: The smallest positive integers not appearing in the first 970,258,158 terms of the c.f. are 13161, 13295, 14734, 14970, 14971, 15795, 15985, 16011, 16110, ... - Eric Weisstein, Sep 21 2011
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Euler-Mascheroni Constant Continued Fraction
prog: (PARI) (15000 precision digits) v=contfrac(Euler); a(n)=if(n<0,0,s=1; while(abs(n-component(v,s))>0,s++); s)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
